abstract: Ri Chol-Myong (Hanja: 李哲民,Korean: 리철명, born 18 February 1988) is a North Korean international football player. He plays for Pyongyang City in the DPR Korea League.He has played on thirteen occasions for the North Korean national team, scoring a goal in the 2010 AFC Challenge Cup against Kyrgyzstan. He has been called up to their 23-man squad for the 2010 FIFA World Cup.Ri Chol-Myong was a part of the squad in the 2010 Asian Games. Korea DRR lost 8-9 in a penalty shoot-out in the hands of UAE in the quarter-finals. Korea DPR lost because of the penalty Ri missed.
